New Records: Adolis García set a record with 15 RBIs in the ALCS series and 10 total bases in Game 7.
García had a historic postseason with seven home runs and 20 RBIs.
Key Match Events: García hit a grand slam in Game 6 under immense pressure.
A benches-clearing incident occurred after an Astros pitcher was accused of intentionally throwing at García.
Pre-Game Insights: The Rangers had a strong offensive depth and a confident approach heading into Game 7.
Manager Chris Young emphasized the team's momentum and preparation.
Post-Match Reflections: Rangers' general manager Chris Young praised García's contributions and the team's resilience.
The victory was seen as a pivotal moment in the Rangers' playoff push.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rangers' turnaround from a losing season to winning the pennant was highlighted.
García's journey from Cuba to the majors and his impact on the team were noted.
